text: "I Brake for Brunettes" is a song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Rhett Akins. It was released in January 1995 as the second single from the album A Thousand Memories. The song reached No. 36 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Akins and Sandy Ramos. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (1995) !Peak position |- |- |Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|28 |} ==References== Category:1995 singles Category:1995 songs Category:Rhett Akins songs Category:Songs written by Rhett Akins Category:Song recordings produced by Mark Wright (record producer) Category:Decca Records singles
title: I Brake for Brunettes
